query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_floor_plan_zones (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  floor_plan_id INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  zone_type ENUM('production','warehouse','office','maintenance','restricted','common') DEFAULT 'production',
  coordinates JSON NOT NULL,
  color VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT '#3b82f6',
  opacity DECIMAL(3,2) DEFAULT 0.30,
  border_color VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT '#1d4ed8',
  border_width INT DEFAULT 2,
  is_clickable INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  alert_threshold INT DEFAULT 3,
  metadata JSON,
  is_active INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_floor_zone_plan (floor_plan_id),
  INDEX idx_floor_zone_type (zone_type)
);
command:

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  floor_plan_id INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  zone_type ENUM('production','warehouse','office','maintenance','restricted','common') DEFAULT 'production',
  coordinates JSON NOT NULL,
  color VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT '#3b82f6',
  opacity DECIMAL(3,2) DEFAULT 0.30,
  border_color VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT '#1d4ed8',
  border_width INT DEFAULT 2,
  is_clickable INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  alert_threshold INT DEFAULT 3,
  metadata JSON,
  is_active INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_floor_zone_plan (floor_plan_id),
  INDEX idx_floor_zone_type (zone_type)
);
